response.overview: Little Goat Productionsâ€™ documentary Funny Business is the first feature length, insider look at some of the best known cartoonists for the venerable New Yorker magazine. The film won a CINE Golden Eagle Award for excellence in filmmaking. It has been shown in venues throughout New York City, including the Metropolitan Museum of Art,  and was broadcast on WNET, WLIW as well as a variety of PBS stations across the country.
response.tagline: An Inside Look at the Art of Cartooning
response.title: Funny Business

titles.title: Funny Business - An Inside Look at the Art of Cartooning

release_dates.note: Museum of the City of New York
